chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini has a problem:
It doesn't detect WiFi, Bluetooth, or AirDrop.

Thank you,

When the seller receives the package, they have 3 business days (5 business days for portable and home appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 business days to make a refund if necessary.
nThe customer meets the following requirements for the return to be processed:
✔ Confirms that the device has not been opened by a third party, exposed to water, or suffered an impact or drop.
✔ Confirms that they have deleted their personal data.
✔ Have confirmed that they have the return label.
✔ Understands that accessories and the purchase receipt must be included in the return package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.

Remember: Once delivered, the seller has 3 business days (5 business days for portable and home appliances) to repair or replace the item and 2 business days to make a refund if necessary.

Hola, agente
El vendedor no puede proceder al reenvío debido al siguiente motivo:
El artículo está conectado a iCloud o Google.
Se ha añadido más información en este mensaje: Dear Backcare,

The device is currently locked by the customer's iCloud account. Inform the customer to unlink their account or we will not be able to proceed with the repair. The customer can follow the instructions in the link in order to unlink the phone from the iCloud.

https://support.apple.com/es-es/guide/icloud/mmfc0eeddd/icloud

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile

I hope you are having a great day, This is Maria from Back Market.

The customer unlinked iCloud and FMI (attached). Please repair and send the device within 1 business day.

Thanks so much for your assistance, we wait for your reply. 

Regards,
Maria from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue, and we do not have sufficient stock for an exchange. We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards, 
KW
